Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Greeting_01>I'm glad to see you made it to
Outskirt Stable!

These horses are quite the charmers, eh?<sp:5:0:0>
They used to be stabled southwest of
here in <clr:0000>Gerudo Canyon<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0501>But when the <clr:0000>weather changed<clr:ffff> after the
Upheaval, it took that stable by surprise.

<sp:3:0:2:0001>The horses couldn't handle the <clr:0000>extreme
temperatures<clr:ffff>, so I took them in.
Talk_30:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Greeting_01>I'm glad you made it here to
Outskirt Stable.

I just guard the horses. If you want to
use the stable, talk to the stable owner
at the counter.
Or are you interested in the horses?<sp:5:0:0>


These beauties used to be stabled
southwest of here in <clr:0000>Gerudo Canyon<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0501>But when the <clr:0000>weather changed<clr:ffff> after the
Upheaval, it took that stable by surprise.

<sp:3:0:2:0001>The horses couldn't handle the <clr:0000>extreme
temperatures<clr:ffff>, so I took them in.
Talk_31:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive_01>Look at this fancy new stable member!
Now I can give you a little thank-you for
humoring me.
Talk_32:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>Here you go! I added <clr:0000>one point<clr:ffff> to your
Pony Points card.
Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:CallFar_01><sp:0:2:2:7d00>Wh...<sp:5:0:0>WHAT?!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


<sp:3:0:2:0701>Th-that...that valiant creature... Is that a
<clr:0000>honeyvore bear<clr:ffff>?!
Talk_33:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>Here you go! I added <clr:0000>two points<clr:ffff> to your
Pony Points card.
Talk_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:CallFar_01><sp:0:2:2:7d00>Wh...<sp:5:0:0>WHAT?!


<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:3:0:2:0701>Th-that...that noble beast... Is that a
<clr:0000>grizzlemaw bear<clr:ffff>?!
Talk_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_00>What a treat. Thank you!


<sp:3:0:2:0001>The last time I tried to ride one of these,
it tossed me off quicker than you can say,
"Stop, that's a wild animal!"
But what an adorable beastie. That cute
nose... Those sweet eyes...<sp:5:1:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseS_01>Oh dear. I nearly lost myself. Please,
take this.
Talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL_01>I've been taking care of horses my whole
life, but there are still surprises out there.

I guess there's a lot more to the world
than what's right in front of your face.

If I want to learn everything I can about
horses<sp:5:0:0>—and I do—<sp:5:0:0>then I guess I'll have
to stick around a long, long time!
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>Say...<sp:5:0:0> Have you heard any rumors about
<clr:0000>skeletal horses<clr:ffff>?
Talk_37:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:LaughS_00>Oh, one more thing! Here's <clr:0000>one <clr:ffff>Pony
Point for your trouble.
Talk_24:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>Save up those points to get all kinds
of prizes.
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think_01>Did you come back because you're
interested in the <clr:0000>skeletal horses<clr:ffff> too?

<sp:3:0:2:0501>Folks say they appear <clr:0000>night after night<clr:ffff>
near the <clr:0000>Sanidin Park Ruins<clr:ffff>, up the road
north of here.
Are they spirits of dead horses that can't
move on? <sp:5:0:0>Or cursed horses born in the
Upheaval? Or...
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_00>Ah, I'm sorry. I lose my head as soon as
the conversation turns to horses.

Well, I expect it's just a rumor. But if it
WERE true, I'd sure like to <clr:0000>meet one<clr:ffff>.
Talk_25:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Notice_01>Looks like you aren't a <clr:0000>stable member<clr:ffff> yet!


It's worth joining. You can save up <clr:0000>Pony
Points<clr:ffff> and earn rewards.

You can register at the counter inside.
If you do, come see me again.
Talk_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive>Folks say <clr:0000>skeletal horses<clr:ffff> appear <clr:0000>night
after night<clr:ffff> in the <clr:0000>Sanidin Park Ruins<clr:ffff>,
which are up the road north of here.
I'm sure it's just a rumor. But...what if
it isn't? I'd sure like to <clr:0000>meet one<clr:ffff>.
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0501>If you take the road north, there's a place
called the <clr:0000>Sanidin Park Ruins<clr:ffff>. Folks say
they appear there <clr:0000>night after night<clr:ffff>.
Are they spirits of dead horses that can't
move on? <sp:5:0:0>Or cursed horses born in the
Upheaval? Or...<sp:5:1:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_00>Ah, I'm sorry. I lose my head as soon as
the conversation turns to horses.

Well, I expect it's just a rumor. But if it
WERE true, I'd sure like to <clr:0000>meet one<clr:ffff>.
Talk_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_00>I can't believe it really exists.


Hey, precious, if you're lonely on your
own, would you like to stay with me?

<sp:3:0:2:0501>Hmm? Are you... So... Ah. I see.


<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive_01>You already have plenty of friends.
Talk_27:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_00>Wow! Thank you, traveler!


<sp:3:0:2:0001>In my younger days, I tried to tame a bear
or two. Or three. Or... Hm.

I'm pretty sure I still have the bumps from
all the times they sent me flying.

Still, what a gallant creature. So noble...
So grand...<sp:5:1:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseS_01>Oh dear. I lost track of time. Please,
take this.
Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Thank you, traveler. I can scarcely believe
my own eyes.

You know, if I thought this beauty was
alone in the world, I'd try to take care of
it myself.
<sp:3:0:2:0101>But it seems like it has friends <clr:0000>somewhere
deep and dark<clr:ffff>, so I'm not worried.

<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_01>Now take this. It's the least I can do.
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Think_01>With that, I've now seen everyth— Hmm...<sp:5:1:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0401>Say, have you ever tamed any <clr:0000>other
animals<clr:ffff>? Ones that <clr:0000>aren't horses<clr:ffff>?

<sp:3:0:2:0501>When I was young, I tried to tame <clr:0000>forest
animals<clr:ffff> like bears and deer, but I was
thrown off. Sent flying, in fact.
I wonder if it's possible to tame <clr:0000>anything
besides horses<clr:ffff>...

<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>Wouldn't that be amazing? If someone
rode up on a <clr:0000>creature other than a horse<clr:ffff>,
then I'd have really seen everything.
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>*sigh* How incredible would it be to see a
skeletal horse in the flesh. Er, well...<sp:5:1:0> Hm?
Talk_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>Did you come back because you're also
interested in <clr:0000>taming wild beasts<clr:ffff>?

Back in my youth, I would go into forests
and try to tame all sorts of creatures.
<sp:3:0:2:0501>They sent me flying every time.
I tried so hard, it's a miracle I'm here to
talk to you now.

<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Think>I wonder if it's possible to tame <clr:0000>anything
that isn't a horse<clr:ffff>...

It might be another of my foolish dreams,
but I sure would love to see it.
Talk_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Think>I wonder if it's even possible to tame
<clr:0000>anything that isn't a horse<clr:ffff>.

Back in my youth, I'd go into forests and
try to tame all sorts of creatures. They'd
send me flying every time.
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>Maybe it can't be done, but I sure would
like to see <clr:0000>a tamed creature that isn't
a horse<clr:ffff>.
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:CallFar_01><sp:0:2:2:7d00>Wh...<sp:5:0:0>WHAT?!


<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:3:0:2:0701>Th-that...that beautiful beast... Is that a
<clr:0000>mountain deer<clr:ffff>?!
